content:
Title: Marketing Coordinator

Department: Engineering


Description:

As a Marketing Coordinator in the Engineering department, you will support the execution of marketing campaigns...


Responsibilities:

1. Coordinate marketing campaigns and assist with the development of promotional materials. 2. Manage project timelines and ensure smooth communication between teams...


Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field, with 1+ years of experience in a marketing role...
